Name: DNA #1
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Slightly sharp and very fruity, but pleasantly so.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1999 by Emmanuel Audermatte at The Atlantic Bar and Grill in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of DNA #1 contains 177 calories
